verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קַ֤ח <WH3947> Take אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> and his sons אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הַבְּגָדִ֔ים <WH899> with him and the garments וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֑ה <WH4888> and the anointing וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> פַּ֣ר <WH6499> and a bullock הַֽחַטָּ֗את <WH2403> for the sin offering וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and two הָֽאֵילִ֔ים <WH352> rams וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> סַ֥ל <WH5536> and a basket הַמַּצּֽוֹת׃ <WH4682> of unleavened bread

וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> thou all the congregation הַקְהֵ֑ל <WH6950> together אֶל־ <WH413> at פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> did מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַתִּקָּהֵל֙ <WH6950> was gathered together הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> him and the assembly אֶל־ <WH413> at פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> unto the congregation זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to be done

וַיַּקְרֵ֣ב <WH7126> brought מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and washed אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> them with water

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> And he put עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֻּתֹּ֗נֶת <WH3801> upon him the coat וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <WH2296> and girded אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בָּֽאַבְנֵ֔ט <WH73> him with the girdle וַיַּלְבֵּ֤שׁ <WH3847> and clothed אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אֶֽת־ <WH854> with הַמְּעִ֔יל <WH4598> him with the robe וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and put עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> the ephod וַיַּחְגֹּ֣ר <WH2296> upon him and he girded אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> בְּחֵ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH2805> him with the curious girdle הָֽאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> of the ephod וַיֶּאְפֹּ֥ד <WH640> and bound ל֖וֹ בּֽוֹ׃

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> the breastplate וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> upon him also he put אֶל־ <WH413> on הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <WH2833> in the breastplate אֶת־ <WH853> הָאוּרִ֖ים <WH224> the Urim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתֻּמִּֽים׃ <WH8550> and the Thummim

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת <WH4701> the mitre עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> did he put עַֽל־ <WH5921> and on הַמִּצְנֶ֜פֶת <WH4701> also upon the mitre אֶל־ <WH413> about מ֣וּל <WH4136> against פָּנָ֗יו <WH6440> front אֵ֣ת <WH853> צִ֤יץ <WH6731> plate הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> the golden נֵ֣זֶר <WH5145> crown הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> the anointing וַיִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> and anointed אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֑וֹ וַיְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH6942> and all that [was] therein and sanctified אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיַּ֥ז <WH5137> And he sprinkled מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> some עַל־ <WH5921> of הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> thereof upon the altar שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times וַיִּמְשַׁ֨ח <WH4886> and anointed אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֜חַ <WH4196> the altar וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֗יו <WH3627> and all his vessels וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיֹּ֛ר <WH3595> both the laver וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּנּ֖וֹ <WH3653> and his foot לְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <WH6942> to sanctify

וַיִּצֹק֙ <WH3332> And he poured מִשֶּׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> of the anointing עַ֖ל <WH5921> and רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> head אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> upon Aaron's וַיִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> and anointed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לְקַדְּשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6942> him to sanctify

וַיַּקְרֵ֨ב <WH7126> brought מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> Aaron's וַיַּלְבִּשֵׁ֤ם <WH3847> and put כֻּתֳּנֹת֙ <WH3801> coats וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <WH2296> upon them and girded אֹתָם֙ <WH853> אַבְנֵ֔ט <WH73> them with girdles וַיַּחֲבֹ֥שׁ <WH2280> and put לָהֶ֖ם מִגְבָּע֑וֹת <WH4021> bonnets כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> upon them as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיַּגֵּ֕שׁ <WH5066> And he brought אֵ֖ת <WH853> פַּ֣ר <WH6499> the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for the sin offering וַיִּסְמֹ֨ךְ <WH5564> laid אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> and Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head פַּ֥ר <WH6499> of the bullock הַֽחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> for the sin offering

וַיִּשְׁחָ֗ט <WH7819> And he slew וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> [it] and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> the blood וַ֠יִּתֵּן <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on קַרְנ֨וֹת <WH7161> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֤חַ <WH4196> of the altar סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <WH676> with his finger וַיְחַטֵּ֖א <WH2398> and purified אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> the altar וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֗ם <WH1818> the blood יָצַק֙ <WH3332> and poured אֶל־ <WH413> at יְס֣וֹד <WH3247> at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar וַֽיְקַדְּשֵׁ֖הוּ <WH6942> and sanctified לְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> it to make reconciliation עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> also

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <WH3947> And he took אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַחֵלֶב֮ <WH2459> all the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> was on הַקֶּרֶב֒ <WH7130> that [was] upon the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> יֹתֶ֣רֶת <WH3508> and the caul הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> [above] the liver וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> חֶלְבְּהֶ֑ן <WH2459> and their fat וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <WH6999> burned מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> and Moses הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> [it] upon the altar

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֤ר <WH6499> But the bullock וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֹרוֹ֙ <WH5785> and his hide וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂר֣וֹ <WH1320> his flesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6569> and his dung שָׂרַ֣ף <WH8313> he burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with fire מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיַּקְרֵ֕ב <WH7126> And he brought אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֵ֣יל <WH352> the ram הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> for the burnt offering וַֽיִּסְמְכ֞וּ <WH5564> laid אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> of the ram

וַיִּשְׁחָ֑ט <WH7819> And he killed וַיִּזְרֹ֨ק <WH2236> sprinkled מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> [it] and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֛ם <WH1818> the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> the ram נִתַּ֖ח <WH5408> And he cut לִנְתָחָ֑יו <WH5409> into pieces וַיַּקְטֵ֤ר <WH6999> burnt מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> the head וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּתָחִ֖ים <WH5409> and the pieces וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּֽדֶר׃ <WH6309> and the fat

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּרָעַ֖יִם <WH3767> and the legs רָחַ֣ץ <WH7364> And he washed בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> in water וַיַּקְטֵר֩ <WH6999> burnt מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאַ֜יִל <WH352> the whole ram הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חָה <WH4196> upon the altar עֹלָ֨ה <WH5930> it [was] a burnt sacrifice ה֤וּא <WH1931> he לְרֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֥ה <WH801> [and] an offering made by fire הוּא֙ <WH1931> he לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <WH7126> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֣יִל <WH352> ram הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the other אֵ֖יל <WH352> the ram הַמִּלֻּאִ֑ים <WH4394> of consecration וַֽיִּסְמְכ֞וּ <WH5564> laid אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> of the ram

וַיִּשְׁחָ֓ט ׀ <WH7819> And he slew וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> [it] and Moses מִדָּמ֔וֹ <WH1818> of the blood וַיִּתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> of it and put עַל־ <WH5921> on תְּנ֥וּךְ <WH8571> [it] upon the tip אֹֽזֶן־ <WH241> ear אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron's הַיְמָנִ֑ית <WH3233> right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <WH931> and upon the thumb יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of his right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <WH931> and upon the great toe רַגְל֖וֹ <WH7272> foot הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <WH3233> of his right

וַיַּקְרֵ֞ב <WH7126> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> Aaron's וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> put מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> and Moses מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> of the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on תְּנ֤וּךְ <WH8571> upon the tip אָזְנָם֙ <WH241> ear הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of their right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <WH931> and upon the thumbs יָדָם֙ <WH3027> hands הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of their right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <WH931> and upon the great toes רַגְלָ֖ם <WH7272> feet הַיְמָנִ֑ית <WH3233> of their right וַיִּזְרֹ֨ק <WH2236> sprinkled מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֛ם <WH1818> the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on הַֽמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> the fat וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַלְיָ֗ה <WH451> and the rump וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַחֵלֶב֮ <WH2459> and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> was on הַקֶּרֶב֒ <WH7130> that [was] upon the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> יֹתֶ֣רֶת <WH3508> and the caul הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> [above] the liver וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> חֶלְבְּהֶ֑ן <WH2459> and their fat וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שׁ֥וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַיָּמִֽין׃ <WH3225> and the right

וּמִסַּ֨ל <WH5536> And out of the basket הַמַּצּ֜וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> that was לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [was] before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD לָ֠קַח <WH3947> he took חַלַּ֨ת <WH2471> cake מַצָּ֤ה <WH4682> unleavened אַחַת֙ <WH259> one וְֽחַלַּ֨ת <WH2471> and a cake לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> bread שֶׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> of oiled אַחַ֖ת <WH259> bread and one וְרָקִ֣יק <WH7550> wafer אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> and one וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <WH7760> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֣חֲלָבִ֔ים <WH2459> [them] on the fat וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and שׁ֥וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַיָּמִֽין׃ <WH3225> and upon the right

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> all עַ֚ל <WH5921> on כַּפֵּ֣י <WH3709> hands אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> all upon Aaron's וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and on כַּפֵּ֣י <WH3709> hands בָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and upon his sons' וַיָּ֧נֶף <WH5130> and waved אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> them [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
